data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea engelmannii (Engelmann spruce) from sample VERMIL-322

Exposition N, Slope 2 deg, Geology: Kalkreicher Flusschotter, Tree line 1900 m, av. Tree height 25 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 50%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: Uew. auf erster Flusster. 2m über Wassersp, Film number: 707A
